By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "SportsEnergy Tab" Chrome extension and set Chrome™ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab search services provided by Microsoft Bing.

This extension is free to download from the Chrome Web store, and you can uninstall it at any time.
